Text: By the way, be aware that WinZip attempts to install Chrome and make it your default browser unless you uncheck the box. Just so you know...
Not that Chrome is bad (it's fast), but compared to FF, it lacks features: AdBlock, FlashBlock, etc etc...

Thanks but you DO know that Chrome has AdBlock, FlashBlock, etc, etc now with the introduction of extensions... :3
